repl_description:
A support ticketing system built with Streamlit, providing comprehensive ticket management capabilities with GDPR-compliant data handling. The system implements core ticketing features including authentication, file attachments, and user role management, alongside advanced analytics for ticket trends, category distribution, and agent performance metrics.

Key features and technologies:
• Streamlit frontend framework
• GDPR-compliant authentication and role-based access
• File attachment handling
• Email notification system
• Advanced analytics dashboard with trend analysis
• Performance metrics and response time tracking
• Comment system
• Saved filters functionality
• Macro system for bulk ticket operations
